version_description:
- Improved user interface.
- A right menu to quickly access the Surahsis now available.
- The app is more stable.

- Improved user interface.
- A right menu to quickly access the Surahsis now available.
- The app is more stable.

- Minor bug fixes.
- The audio in background is now supported.
- In iOS 8.1 the download is now corrected.
- 2 new reciters have been added.
